University of Santiago de Compostela: The University of Santiago de Compostela - USC (Galician: Universidade de Santiago de Compostela - USC, Spanish: Universidad de Santiago de Compostela - USC) is a public university located in the city of Santiago de Compostela, Galicia, Spain.  A second campus is located in Lugo, Galicia. It is one of the world's oldest universities in continuous operation.
